entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
